_comment: This file is generated. Please edit .homeycompose/app.json instead.

description.en: Let your home equipment think for you.

instruction.en: Triple press the reset button on the dimmer.

hint.en:
The ASSIC of Lifeline: 4C 69 66 65 6C 69 6E 65. 
1. When press and hold down reset button over 5s to reset the dimmer send Device Reset Locally Notification CC to associated devices of this group to report factory reset information. 
2. When load state changes send Switch Multilevel Report CC to associated devices of this group.

Basic Set: 42 61 73 69 63 20 53 65 74. 
1. Short press Knob turn on the dimmer sends Basic Set (0xFF) to associated devices. 
2. Short press Knob turn off the dimmer sends Basic Set (0x00) to associated devices.

Switch Multilevel: 53 77 69 74 63 68 20 4D 75 6C 74 69 6C 65 76 65 6C. 
1. Turn knob to the left sends Switch Multilevel Set (to keep associated devices in sync with this device) to associated devices. 
2. Turn knob to the right sends Switch Multilevel Set (to keep associated devices in sync with this device) to associated devices.

External Button: 45 78 74 65 72 6E 61 6C 20 42 75 74 74 6F 6E. 
1. External button hold send Switch Multilevel Start Level Change (Switchover dimmer Up/Down). 
2. External button release send Switch Multilevel Stop Level Change.

instruction.en: To Include, quick press Config Button for two times.
To Include, quick press Config Button for two times.

Double press the reset button.

If pairing does not start after 20 seconds, reset the device by press and hold reset button for over 5 seconds.
For inclusion, long press M for 5s when in "Advance settings -> in-network mode".

desc.en: Reset the accumulated power usage (kWh), this can not be restored.

1. When press and hold down reset button over 5s to reset the dimmer send Device Reset Locally Notification CC to associated devices of this group to report factory reset information.

label.en: The state the dimmer should return to once power is restored after a power failure.

hint.en:
0 - off 
1~99%
100-Returns to level before power outage.(Default)

The Dimmer will send notification to associated device(Group Lifeline)when the status of Dimmer load is changed.
1 - The function is disabled. 
2- Send Switch Multilevel Report. 
3- Send Basic Report.

1- Linear dimming. 
2- Logarithmic dimming.

When turn on the dimmer from off status Setting of 0 means that the dimmer will use TOP parameter 1. 
Valid value: 0-99

label.en: Setting delay time when turn off

hint.en: unit is second. Vaild value: 0-60

instruction.en: To Include, quick press Config Button for two times.
please refer to manual for how to activate pairing.
To Include, short press Config Button three times.

hint.en:
1. Notification Report.
2. Battery Report.
3. Device Reset Locally.
Basic Set

instruction.en: To Include, short press Config Button three times.

hint.en:
This setting will disable the door alarm after the given time (in seconds) has expired. Every time door is observed by the device it will reset this timeout.
Range: 60 - 86400, default: 300 [s]

By soldering two contact points on the PCB it's possible to reduce the door blind time to 5 seconds instead of the minimum 60 seconds. Enabling this setting will allow you to override the minimum of 60 seconds for cancelling the alarm and will set it to 5 seconds.

instruction.en: To Include, short press Config Button three times.

hint.en:
1. Notification Report.
2. Sensor Multilevel Report.
3. Battery Report.
4. Device Reset Locally.
Basic Set

instruction.en: To Include, short press Config Button three times.

hint.en: Device alarm report count

This setting will disable the motion alarm after the given time (in seconds) has expired. Every time motion is observed by the device it will reset this timeout.
Range: 60 - 86400, default: 300 [s]
hint.nl:
Deze instelling zal het bewegingsalarm uitschakelen na de tijd (in seconden) is verstreken. Elke keer dat opnieuw beweging wordt gedetecteerd wordt deze timer herstart.
Bereik: 60 - 86400, Standaard: 300 [s]

hint.en: By soldering two contact points on the PCB it's possible to reduce the motion blind time to 5 seconds instead of the minimum 60 seconds. Enabling this setting will allow you to override the minimum of 60 seconds for cancelling the alarm and will set it to 5 seconds.
hint.nl: Door twee contactpunten op de printplaat te solderen is het mogelijk om de blindtijd van de sensor terug te brengen naar 5 seconden. Inschakelen van deze instelling maakt het mogelijk om de instelling voor het annuleren van de bewegingsmelder te overschrijven tot 5 seconden.

desc.en: This flag is used to determine that the device itself has no power measurement functionality, but that the driver calculates the energy use.
desc.ru: Этот флаг используется для определения того, что само устройство не имеет функции измерения электроэнергии, но драйвер рассчитывает потребление энергии.
desc.pl: Flaga oznacza, że samo urządzenie nie ma funkcji pomiaru mocy, ale sterownik oblicza zużycie energii.

desc.en: When a device has both an `onoff` and `dim` capability, and Homey wants to turn the device on AND to a specific dim value, set this capability to `false` to prevent Homey from sending a set command.
desc.de: Wenn ein Gerät sowohl 'An/Aus'- als auch 'Dimm'-Fähigkeit hat und Homey das Gerät anschalten UND auf einen bestimmten Wert dimmen will, setze diese Fähigkeit auf 'false', um Homey am Senden eines Setzen-Befehls zu hindern.
desc.fr: Quand un appareil peut `allumer/éteindre` et `estomper`, et que Homey veut allumer l'appareil ET sur une valeur d'estompage spécifique, définissez cette capacité sur `faux` pour empêcher Homey d'envoyer une commande de définition.
desc.it: Quando un dispositivo può 'accendersi' e 'attenuarsi' e Homey desidera attivare il dispositivo E definire un valore specifico, imposta questa funzione su 'falso' per impedire a Homey di inviare un comando di definizione.
desc.sv: När en enhet har både en `på/av`- och `dim`-funktionalitet och Homey vill slå på enheten OCH till ett specifikt dimvärde, sätt den här funktionen till `falsk` för att förhindra att Homey skickar ett inställningskommando.
desc.no: Når en enhet har både en `på/av`- og en `dempe`-funksjon og Homey vil slå på enheten OG sette dempingen til en spesifikk verdi, sett denne egenskapen til `usann` for å forhindre at Homey sender en innstillingskommando.
desc.es: Cuando un dispositivo tiene tanto la capacidad 'encender/apagar' como la de 'intensidad de la luz', y Homey quiere encender el dispositivo Y ajustar una intensidad concreta, configura esta capacidad como 'falso' para evitar que Homey envíe un comando de configuración.
desc.da: Når en enhed har både en `tænd/sluk`- og en `dæmpe`-funktion, og Homey vil tænde for enheden OG indstille til en specifik dæmpeværdi, skal denne funktion indstilles til  `falsk` for at forhindre, at Homey sender en indstillingskommando.
desc.ru: Когда устройство имеет функции `onoff` и `dim`, и Homey хочет включить устройство ТАКЖЕ с определенным значением яркости, установите для этой функции значение `false`, чтобы Homey не отправил команду на установку.
desc.pl: Jeśli urządzenie ma zdolności „wł.wył.” i „przygaś”, a urządzenie Homey chce włączyć produkt ORAZ ustawić konkretną wartość przygaszenia, ustaw tę zdolność jako „nieadekwatne” – w ten sposób Homey nie będzie wysyłać ustawionych poleceń.

desc.en: When this capability is false, give a visual hint to greyout the device.
desc.de: wenn diese Fähigkeit 'false' ist, gibt es einen visuellenen Hinweis, um das Gerät auszugrauen.
desc.fr: Quand cette capacité est fausse, donnez un indice visuel pour griser cet appareil.
desc.it: Quando questa funzione è impostata su falso, dai un indizio visivo per far apparire questo dispositivo in grigio.
desc.sv: När den här funktionen är falsk, ge en ett visuellt tips för att gråa ut enheten.
desc.no: Når denne egenskapen er usann, gi et visuelt tips for å vise enheten i grått.
desc.es: Cuando esta capacidad es falsa, da una indicación visual para poner en gris el dispositivo.
desc.da: Når denne funktion er falsk, skal du give et visuelt tip for at vise enheden i grå.
desc.ru: Когда функция ложна, установите визуальную подсказку, чтобы выделить устройство серым цветом.
desc.pl: Jeśli zdolność jest nieadekwatna, użyj wizualnej wskazówki, aby wyświetlić urządzenie na szaro.
